trans-unit.source: Passed to custom WSDL exporters and importers to enable customization of the metadata export and import processes for a contract.
trans-unit.target: 传递给自定义 WSDL 导出程序和导入程序，从而为协定自定义元数据导出过程和导入过程。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext> object to examine and modify items that are to be converted to or from WSDL.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext> 对象可以检查或修改要转换为 WSDL 或从 WSDL 进行转换的项。

trans-unit.source: When exporting metadata a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext> object is passed to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportEndpoint%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 导出元数据时，会有一个 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext> 对象传递到 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportEndpoint%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the various methods and properties to obtain metadata objects that you can use to examine and modify to alter the published WSDL.
trans-unit.target: 有多个方法和属性可用于获取元数据对象，您可利用获取的元数据对象进行检查和修改，从而更改已发布 WSDL。

trans-unit.source: When importing metadata a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext> object is passed to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 导入元数据时，会有一个 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext> 对象传递到 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the various methods and properties to obtain metadata objects that you can use to examine and modify the imported metadata.
trans-unit.target: 有多个方法和属性可用于获取元数据对象，您可利用获取的元数据对象检查和修改导入数据。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext> to add custom WSDL annotations to the exported metadata using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext.WsdlPortType%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext.Contract%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了如何借助 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext.WsdlPortType%2A> 属性，利用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext.Contract%2A> 将自定义 WSDL 批注添加到导出元数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription" /> being exported or imported.
trans-unit.target: 获取正在被导出或导入的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription" /> being exported or imported.
Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext.Contract%2A> property to obtain the contract description on export or import.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext.Contract%2A> 属性获取导出或导入的协定说明。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext> to add custom WSDL annotations to the exported metadata using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext.WsdlPortType%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext.Contract%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了如何借助 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext.WsdlPortType%2A> 属性，利用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext.Contract%2A> 将自定义 WSDL 批注添加到导出元数据。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> for the requested <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription" />.
Returns the fault description for the specified fault.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定错误的错误说明。

trans-unit.source: The fault description for the specified fault.
The value was not found.
The value is null.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessage" /> for the requested <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MessageDescription" />.
Returns the message description for the specified message.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定消息的消息说明。

trans-unit.source: The message description for the specified message.
The value was not found.
The value is null.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" /> for the requested <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" />.
Returns the operation for the specified operation description.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定操作说明的操作。

trans-unit.source: The operation for the specified operation description.

The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext> to add custom WSDL annotations to the exported metadata using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext.WsdlPortType%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext.Contract%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了如何借助 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext.WsdlPortType%2A> 属性，利用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext.Contract%2A> 将自定义 WSDL 批注添加到导出元数据。

trans-unit.source: When exporting operations, the method iterates through the operation descriptions, and locates each associated <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation?displayProperty=nameWithType> by calling the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext.GetOperation%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 导入操作时，该方法会循环访问操作说明，并会通过调用 <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation?displayProperty=nameWithType> 方法，查找所有关联 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext.GetOperation%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The value was not found.
The value is null.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" /> for the requested <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" />.
Returns the operation description associated with the operation.
trans-unit.target: 返回与该操作关联的操作说明。

trans-unit.source: The operation description associated with the operation.
trans-unit.target: 与该操作关联的操作说明。

trans-unit.source: The value was not found.
The value is null.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription" /> for the requested <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" />.
Returns the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> for the requested <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> for the requested <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription" />.
The value was not found.
The value is null.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MessageDescription" /> for the requested <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessage" />.

Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessage" /> object for the specified <paramref name="message" /> that represents a message type passed by the action of an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessage" /> 的 <paramref name="message" /> 对象，该对象表示 XML Web services 的操作所传递的消息类型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessage" /> object that represents a message type passed by the action of an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示消息类型的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessage" /> 对象，该消息类型是 XML Web services 的操作传递的。

trans-unit.source: The value was not found.
The value is null.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType" /> that represents the contract.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType" /> that represents the contract.

The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext> to add custom WSDL annotations to the exported metadata using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext.WsdlPortType%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext.Contract%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了如何借助 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext.WsdlPortType%2A> 属性，利用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext.Contract%2A> 将自定义 WSDL 批注添加到导出元数据。
